# epilot-designbuilder Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
terraform {
  required_providers {
    epilot-designbuilder = {
      source  = "epilot-dev/epilot-designbuilder"
      version = "0.8.0"
    }
  }
}

provider "epilot-designbuilder" {
  # Configuration options
}
```
